Getting Started on a Distill Website

Getting Started on a Distill Website
A few days ago I found a blog post talking about using Distill as a compiler for simple websites. I am more comfortable with R and Rmarkdown than I am with using something like Jekyll, but there were still quite a few bumps in the road getting the site functional
Installation of Distill is simple enough


install.packages("distill")
library(distill)



The tricky part to setting up a Github website was figuring out where files are being written to and read in from. Some sites recommended that you write output from Distill to a _site directory, however, for me Github would only read from either the base directory or from a docs/ directory.
